Who: SCOURGE, SCORPONOK, Hydras, Darkhawk, Nightshift
Location: Black Fortress - Throne Room

As the shirukens fly through the air Scourge ducked and dodged, his
agility granting him a speed that made him difficult to hit. However
he grunted as one caught him in the arm, the sound of metal on metal
ringing painfully for a moment.

Crimson optics focused painfully on Nightshift as he reached over and
by force he ripped the metal blade out of his arm, and with a deft
flick of the wrist sent it spinning through the air!

Nightshift's own shuriken went flying back at him!

Scorponok, unlike Scourge made no effort to avoid the blades. Unlike
those of lesser structure, the mighty Neo-Decepticon simply brushed
them away, using his mighty claws like a human would against gnats.
While one managed to strike, it was unable to penetrate his dense
armor.

"Is that all you got?? Stick pins??" Scorponok smiled grimly, "This
will be easier than I thought!"

Scorponok continued to fire at Nightshift with plasma cannons!

Even as they spoke the security doors rumbled and began to close all
around the base as well as at the throne room!

(TAG)

Preston
